title: What League Replay system do you use?
body: So I've been using BaronReplays to save my games so I can spectate them later but it has some kind of aids that pretty much chooses when it wants to work. What programs do you know of (that work?)

replies.body: I use http://replay.gg/ it's reliably records all games, but always cuts off before the end for some reason.
I used to use this too! but I didn't watch many replays....I should start again (Would really help me improve).

I use replay.gg too, it's pretty reliable but the replays can crash, particularly if you jump around to different time points a lot. 
Lately I've also been recording my games directly through shadow play (from Nvidea) this is really good because it gives you the game exactly as you saw it while you where playing, you can see your mouse clicks and ability usage etc. That way you can see exactly what you did and what you were focusing, makes your mistakes very clear.
